articleinfo.title: The Linux Documentation Project Weekly News

listitem.para: Binh Nguyen submitted minor updates for the Linux Dictionary.
Christine Lorenz submitted v2.4.0 of the EVMS User Guide.
Lars Strand submitted a draft 802.1X HOWTO.
Wim van Dorst sent in a new version of the BogoMips HOWTO.
Werner Heuser updated the Laptop HOWTO, the document has now been renamed to Linux Mobile Guide.
Claudio Cattazo let us know that the following documents have been translated by the Italian Linux Documentation Project:
Bogomips HOWTO: translation by Federico Lucifredi, revised by Claudio Cattazzo
DocBook Demystification HOWTO: translated by Luca Ferraro and Giuseppe Briotti, revision by Sebastiano Gazzola
Ethernet HOWTO: translation by Federico Lucifredi, revision by Claudio Cattazzo
Masquerading Simple HOWTO: translation by Riccardo Fabris, revision by Claudio Cattazzo
Qmail VMailMgr and Courier-Imap HOWTO: translation by Sebastiano Gazzola, revision by Giuseppe Briotti
XFree86 HOWTO: translated by Federico Lucifredi, revised by Claudio Cattazzo
The Advanced Bash Scripting Guide: translation by Emilio Conti, revision by Derdiando Ferranti

sect1.title: HOWTO contribute to The LDP
sect1.para: The Linux Documentation Project (TLDP) is working on developing free, high quality documentation for the GNU/Linux operating system. If you want to help TLDP, consider joining discuss-subscribe@en.tldp.org.

Help us create this newsletter. We need volunteers who follow the community (mailing lists, newsgroups, web channels) and report events related to free software documentation. Write to us at feedback@en.tldp.org.
The LDP Weekly News is compiled and edited by Machtelt Garrels and Y Giridhar Appaji Nag with help from several other people.
